input.sentences: before we left our room | i wanted to take a picture of my wife .
we left the room to go outside and view the pool .
after the pool | we left the resort to explore the lovely city .
we arrived at this outdoor venue that was immaculate .
the last thing we did was take pictures at the beach .
output.sentences: We're Married and heading to our honeymoon!
The resort has a nice size pool and it's quiet.
Just look at this beautiful scenery.
Even the inside of the resort was wonderful.
It wouldn't be a vacation without hitting the beach.
